front.title: Session Description Protocol (SDP) Indicators for Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS)

abstract.t: This specification defines how to use the Session DescriptionProtocol (SDP) to signal that media will be transported over DatagramTransport Layer Security (DTLS) or where the SRTP security context isestablished using DTLS and. It reuses the syntax and semantics foran SDP 'fingerprint' attribute that identifies the certificate whichwill be presented during the DTLS handshake.
